LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerClaw.label: Miho Power Claw
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerClaw.description: A power claw with 3 blades and 1 awl.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerClaw.tools.0.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerClaw.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerHammer.label: Miho Power Hammer
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerHammer.description: A modified rock drill used by Miho. Good for demolishing buildings or mining.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerHammer.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RingedBlade.label: Miho Hwando
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RingedBlade.description: A great machete, good for crushing enemies.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RingedBlade.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RingedBlade.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RingedBlade.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Tachi.label: Miho Nodachi
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Tachi.description: A huge single-edged sword. It is said that it was used by the warriors of the ancient earth.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Tachi.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Tachi.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Tachi.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Sappertool.label: Miho Sapper Hammer
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Sappertool.description: A combined blade and tool-head attached to a sturdy haft. While slightly less effective than other weapons against human enemies, it excels at tearing down walls, doors, and other structures thanks to its integrated tool-head.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Sappertool.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Sappertool.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.label: Miho Plasma Nodachi
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.description: An improved, huge single-edged sword that emits plasma. The blade's cutting power is comparable to that of the jetstream warriors of Ancient Earth.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexB.label: Eltex Rod (B)
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexB.description: A psychic rod optimized for neural heat recovery.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexB.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexA.label: Eltex Rod (A)
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexA.description: A psychic rod optimized for storing neural heat.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexA.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexAxe.label: Eltex Battle Axe
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexAxe.description: An Eltex weapon with good melee performance.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexAxe.tools.0.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexAxe.tools.1.label: point
